subject: Selling my minibox
author: bhali333
full_text:
If anyone is interested I have my minibox on ebay for a 150.00 less 
than what PS is charging and it comes with the speaker another 25.00 
value.

If anybody is interested let me know.
The reason it's being sold is, I have about 15 boxes all together and 
now with EVPM, it will just sit and go to waste. I have only used it 
about ten times.

here's the link
